member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HdrToneMapEffect
member.summary: This effect adjusts the dynamic range of an image to better suit its content to the capability of the output display.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D HDR tone map effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HdrToneMapEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the HdrToneMapEffect class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HdrToneMapEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for the effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HdrToneMapEffect.InputMaxLuminance
member.summary: The maximum light level (or MaxCLL) of the image, in nits. Default value 4000.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HdrToneMapEffect.OutputMaxLuminance
member.summary: The MaxCLL supported by the output target, in nits - typically set to the MaxCLL of the display. Default value 300.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HdrToneMapEffect.DisplayMode
member.summary: When set to Hdr, the tone mapping curve is adjusted to better fit the fit the behavior of common HDR displays. Default value Sdr.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HdrToneMapEffectDisplayMode
member.summary: The display mode used for the effect.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HdrToneMapEffectDisplayMode.Sdr
member.summary: Specifies that the tone mapper algorithm be optimized for best appearance on a standard dynamic range (SDR) display.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HdrToneMapEffectDisplayMode.Hdr
member.summary: Specifies that the tone mapper algorithm be optimized for best appearance on a high dynamic range (HDR) display.
